10/ Our team will be reviewing submissions and will announce when bounties have been successfully claimed! Head over to https://t.co/EWpieiUYw1 for more information and with any questions you may have. 

TL;DR: CAN THE DEVS DO SOMETHING?

9/ To claim a bounty you must be the first to submit a complete solution (with tests) to the official Lens Protocol repository, release all rights to the code (all new modules need to follow Lensâ€™s Open Source License), and provide a valid Ethereum address.
8/ ReFiCollectModule (3 ETH) - Extend the FeeCollectModule to use all received fees to buy @ToucanProtocolâ€™s BCT and send to a designated address to be queued for retirement.

7/ AaveLimitedFeeCollectModule (1 ETH) - Extend the LimitedFeeCollectModule to deposit all received fees into the Aave @0xPolygon Market (if applicable for the asset) and send the resulting aTokens to the beneficiary.

6/ veFollow Snapshot Strategy (0.75 ETH) - Create a @SnapshotLabs Strategy that gives all wallets that hold FollowNFTs of a given profile voting power. The voting power should linearly increase, the longer they have held the FollowNFT.
5/ IsFollower Snapshot Strategy (0.5 ETH) - Create a @SnapshotLabs Strategy that grants a wallet 1 vote if it contains any FollowNFTs for a given profile.
4/ TokenGatedFollowModule (1 ETH) - Validate a wallet has more than â€œbalanceâ€ of â€œtokenâ€ prior to issuing the followNFT.

3/ FollowOnlyCollect (1 ETH) - Extend the LimitedFeeCollectModule to take 2 added inputs â€œprofileâ€ and â€œmaxIDâ€, validate the wallet trying to collect holds the FollowNFT of â€œprofileâ€ and has an ID less than or equal to â€œmaxIDâ€ before processing collect.
2/ StepwiseCollectModule (1 ETH) - Extend the LimitedFeeCollectModule to take an added parameter â€œstepâ€ that increases the price linearly every collect.

10/ Whatâ€™s bloominâ€™? ğŸª´ Lens Protocol is fully open source for the community to build on. Social apps, analytics platforms, verification systems, DAO tooling... whatever you can dream up, you can build. https://t.co/06NoTnKn6c

9/ ğŸ”„ Some things are too good to keep to yourself. Re-share a post using the mirror feature! By amplifying content, you receive a â€œmirror feeâ€ from anyone who collects the original content through your share.

8/ğŸ’š Like what you see? You can collect publications from people you follow. A new form of self-expression, curate your collection, and show off what you love. This collect feature enables anyone to collect your content based on the price, edition size, and time limit you set!

7/ ğŸ“ Pictures, music, videos, a great poetic work of art â€“ whatever masterpiece you want to create and share, you can with a publication. Lens Protocol supports IPFS and any media type that inspires you!

6/ğŸ‘¥When you follow someone, youâ€™re granted a follow NFT. Each of these NFTs has a unique token ID that comes with innate rarity & utility. These unique traits can be used to limit voting to your most loyal fans in governance snapshots. They can even be traded on an open market!

5/ğŸ‘¤Profile NFTs are the main primitive of the Lens Protocol. These dynamic NFTs are composable, non-custodial & permissionless. Individual addresses can own profile NFTs, an address can have multiple profile NFTs & a profile NFT can be owned & run by a DAO via a multisig wallet!

4/ Lens Protocol has familiar social media functions like having a profile, commenting, resharing a post, and more â€“ but unlike social media of the past, Lens Protocol is powered by NFTs, so you own and control all of your content. Here's how it worksğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ https://t.co/LqnQ8Kr37w

3/ What is it? ğŸ§ Lens Protocol is a composable and decentralized social graph, ready for you to build on so you can focus on creating a great experience, not scaling your users. ğŸ˜ Read more at https://t.co/73lRDtMJ4C https://t.co/KvvDZDRqSI
